name: Mag Defense
description:
Defend the city against an invasion from space. Launch magnetic repulsion bombs to deviate incoming missiles, and use the enemy weapons against them.

The vision for this project was (naturally) something greater, but within the time limits, I am happy I was able to produce at least a playable game with the intended core.

Used assets

  • https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-enemy-spaceship-2d-sprites-pixel-art
  • https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-city-2
  • https://gamesupply.itch.io/massive-weapon-package
  • https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/5425853-beautiful-night-sky-with-stars
  • https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
